Interests) Regulations, 2024 (the Regulations) superseding Insurance Regulatory and 
Development Authority of India (Protection of Policyholders’ Interests) Regulations, 2017 &

2. EFFECTIVE DATE FOR IMPLEMENTATION OF THE POLICY
sample_text:
The Policy shall be effective from the date of the approval of the Board. The Company shall 
periodically review the Policy based on the inputs received from the Policyholders, IRDAI, 
Statutory Authorities and other sources.

title: 3. OBJECTIVE OF THE POLICY
sample_text:
i 
The key objective of the Policy is to provide for a mechanism to address all the requirements 
of the Policyholders and speedy resolution for the grievance and complaints of the 
Policyholders to their satisfaction and in accordance with the regulatory framework.
